external_games.name: Mamegoma 2: Uchi no Ko ga Ichiban!

name: Mamegoma 2: Uchi no Ko ga Ichiban!
storyline: Carefully, cutely, grow up! The second installment of the Nintendo DS "Mamegoma" series, where you can enjoy the joy of raising them as pets, is finally here!
summary:
This time, a very cute “Baby Mamegoma” is newly introduced! In addition, you will be able to keep two animals at the same time, so you can enjoy watching the Mamegoma parent and child playing together. In addition, "Mamegoma", which swims smoothly in the water, will be unveiled for the first time! The sight of Mamegoma, which is relaxing on the ground, swimming around freely is a moving sight! Daily care such as feeding and cleaning is very easy! If you teach it words, it will show you various poses! There are a total of 32 types of Mamegoma that appear in the game!

Why don't you grow your favorite Mamegoma?

videos.name: Trailer
videos.title: まめゴマ2 うちのコがイチバン! CM
